title: Design pattern learning for sustainable AI development

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Machine Learning Concepts, Basic Understanding of Sustainability
context.additional_context: Requires content design optimized for smartphone-based learning environments. Practice-centered design applying sustainability concepts (ESG: Environment, Social, Governance) to AI development

learning_goals: Classify 35 sustainability design patterns across the four stages of the AI development process (planning-development-deployment-operation)
Evaluate the sustainability impact of AI systems based on the ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance) framework
Propose sustainability design strategies for stakeholders (developers, planners, policymakers, etc.) through actual case analysis

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
